game.name: Spect
game.description:
Hey boys! You are in a space world where you have to guide a spaceship that wants to fly high in the sky. Would you able to control it like a pro and show off the world that you are an expert spaceship driver? Join Spect and be prepared to protect your ship when it flies in the sky! Make sure to keep it away from the deadly asteroids and enemy space crafts for its long survival. Common friends! You would have shield, missiles and weapons to save your character.

Use your weapons to gun down all of the ships and do not forget to grab the power ups along the way! Keep your eyes on the screen and try to make your ship survive for as long as possible in this brand new action packed game! Put your quick reflexes and ship flying abilities to the test to create your new best score and beat your previous high score! In this one of the best addictive space shooting games, you would have to slide to control your spaceship to dodge the bullets of your enemies.

Win fights, earn coins and do not forget to use those gem and coins to upgrade your spaceship in this HTML5 action game! No need to be scared of when many giant enemies and alien invaders will stand against you. Make sure to apply the appropriate strategies and spaceships for each level and fight against the boss. You can also use the power-up items and booster items to level up with ease. No need to be worried since it if you are stuck or get bored, our extensive collection of free space shooter challenges is enough to help find out a good space for fun and entertainment.
